sentences.en: Baste it once, turn it over and cook it for 20 more minutes.
sentences.cn: 涂上油, 翻一下,然后烤20分钟.
不时在马铃薯上涂点油。

sentences.en: If he's rude to me again, I'll baste his coat.
sentences.cn: 如果他再对我无礼的话, 我就要揍他了.

sentences.en: Mother used a large spoon to baste the chicken.
sentences.cn: 母亲在鸡肉上润以一大匙的油脂.

sentences.en: The epidemic experts and Baste research institute are trying to prevent the expansion of the desease.
sentences.cn: 专攻传染性疾病的医生和马达加斯加巴斯德研究所正努力试图阻止疫情的扩散.

sentences.en: To prepare the seam for stitching, join right sides together and baste on the seam line.
sentences.cn: 将需要缉缝的线准备好, 将纪念品物正面合在一起并在缝线上机制粗缝.

sentences.en: Turn the shanks and baste them once or twice as they cook.
sentences.cn: 将小腿肉翻一下，烹调时在上面抹一两次油。

words.tran_cn: 疏缝；假缝；疏缝用线；（烤肉时的）涂油脂
粗缝；在…上涂油；狠揍；大骂

trans.tran_cn: 粗缝, 润以油脂, (在烤肉上)涂油, 狠揍, 大骂
trans.tran_en: to pour liquid or melted fat over food that is cooking

trans.tran_cn: 打，粗缝，痛斥，（烤肉等时）往上抹[浇]油
